ComicInfo.Title: Oath of Thorns
ComicInfo.Summary:
The beasts are loose and CHIP is under attack! While Mel and Candlestick look for safety, Belle has her own problems to deal with. With the walls closing in around all our heroes they are going to need a miracle to survive what's coming their way. Don't miss this pulse-pounding next issue of Belle: Oath of Thorns!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Mohan Sivakami | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | John Royle, Jagdish Kumar & Sebastian Cheng | 3 | D | Cover D | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
